attributes.action: More resources and help for people that suffer with mental health.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to help get more resources for mental health.
attributes.background: There aren’t enough resources to help the many of people that suffer with mental health. I feel like people get brushed aside that sometimes really need help. I need help myself but there’s just not enough resources for it to be done immediately,we really need more resources to help a lot of people.
